name: Asteroid Game Project
description:
An asteroids like minigame where you fly around and shoot astroids to get the highscore. Use bombs to get out of dangerous situations!

Controller will only work if connected before starting the game.

Controls:      

KeyboardControllerThrustUp KeyB
Steering Arrow KeysD-PadShootingSpaceRBBombCtrlLBPauseP

Have Fun!
